channel.title: CVE Feed for MailMunch -- MailMunch – Grow your Email List
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MailMunch -- MailMunch – Grow your Email List

item.title: CVE-2023-41852|2024-08-02T19:09:49.169Z -- mailmunch -- mailmunch%20%E2%80%93%20grow%20your%20email%20list
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MailMunch MailMunch – Grow your Email List plugin <= 3.1.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31349|2024-06-04T17:36:26.898Z -- mailmunch -- mailmunch%20%E2%80%93%20grow%20your%20email%20list
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MailMunch MailMunch – Grow your Email List allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MailMunch – Grow your Email List: from n/a through 3.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-31349|2024-08-02T01:52:56.550Z -- mailmunch -- mailmunch%20%E2%80%93%20grow%20your%20email%20list
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MailMunch MailMunch – Grow your Email List allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MailMunch – Grow your Email List: from n/a through 3.1.6.
